alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 5:03AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE LOWER MARYLAND AND VIRGINIA EASTERN SHORE EARLY THIS MORNING... Calm conditions have allowed areas of fog to develop early this morning across much of the lower Maryland and Virginia eastern shore. Through 8 am, visibilities will average between one half mile and 2 miles, but will be locally reduced to one quarter mile or less at times. If the lower visibilities become more widespread an upgrade to a Dense Fog Advisory may be needed. Gradually improving conditions are expected after 8 am. Motorists should be alert for sudden changes in visibility due to the areas of dense fog. Drive at reduced speeds and use low beam headlights only.
